statements: SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE payment_terms = 'NET 30';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contract_details FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE payment_terms = 'Net 30' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, payment_terms FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT contact_person_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM contract_details WHERE contract_value > 5000 ORDER BY contract_start_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT contact_person_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, contract_value FROM contract_details WHERE contract_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND contract_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts INNER JOIN contract_details ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = contract_details.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person_name, contact_email, contract_start_date, contract_end_date, contract_value FROM supplier_contacts JOIN contract_details USING (supplier_id);
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date, contract_amount FROM contract_details WHERE contract_amount > 5000;
SELECT payment_id, payment_due_date, payment_amount FROM payment_terms WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM payment_terms WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date, contract_amount, terms FROM contract_details WHERE contract_amount > 5000 ORDER BY contract_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email, phone_number FROM supplier_contacts JOIN contract_details ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = contract_details.supplier_id WHERE contract_amount < 10000;

SELECT supplier_name, email, payment_amount, payment_status FROM supplier_contacts JOIN contract_details ON supplier_contacts.supplier_id = contract_details.supplier_id JOIN payment_terms ON contract_details.contract_id = payment_terms.contract_id WHERE payment_status = 'Due' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM suppliers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT start_date, end_date, total_value FROM contracts ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT term_description, due_date FROM payment_terms WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_id, street, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, email FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, term_description, due_date FROM payment_terms ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, total_value FROM contracts WHERE total_value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contact;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_contact WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contact_person, email FROM supplier_contact WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM contract_details ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, payment_amount FROM payment_terms WHERE payment_due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_terms;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier_contact WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_date FROM contract_details WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT contact_person, email FROM supplier_contact WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email FROM supplier_contact ORDER BY supplier_name, contact_person;
